title: Cleavage Issue
body:
So i saw the new Vayne skin. And even its a fictional character i immediately noticed her BIG cleavage.

Even i wouldn't complain as a straight guy and grown man, i wonder why it's okay that Vayne has it but Camille not in her latest skin?

and no, i am not alone. others recognized the subtle change too. --> 

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/9wtcgq/with_the_pbe_update_they_have_nerfed_coven/

So my solution to this is:  give either Camille's skin her cleavage back, or reduce it on Vaynes. Easy as that.

(Btw i would like to know why you even changed it for Camille, ty)

greetings
______

**Edit:** Cause some seem to not understand my point i expain it as short as possible cause i didn't thought its that hard to understand (but maybe its cause i am no native speaker):

**i didn't complain about they show too much skin. it's the other way around. its a fictional game with digital champions. and yet Riot removes here and there skin just cause of some loud crying dudes on... reddit or whatever i guess. instead of let the fantasy be.**

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Phridolin,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=JRK7kKYr,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-01-10T04:07:04.971+0000)
>

> So my solution to this is:  give either Camille&#039;s skin her cleavage back, or reduce it on Vaynes. Easy as that.
>

Thats an extremely petty solution as it basically boils down to "I don't get what I want,so no one else is allowed to have it either"


I understand that you are upset about the change of a chroma,after it was released and would also say that riot should change it back,but I don't think you should drag others down for it.

Yeah I kinda agree with you. But I am a bit angry cause of some reddit kids riot change things ASAP and I complained for example about warwicks feral skin with solid arguments (unlike these here) even before his release on the live servers and NOTHING got changed. 

It literally sucks that always the things get changed visually which are imo superficial and things I - and i bet others too - would change don’t get any notice.

Some skins for female champs have cleavage, some not.

I dont know what is the issue.

the issue is, that Riot listen to some loud voices on "reddit" or whatsoever and remove EXISTING things. and in this case without any real statement as far as i know. but on other skins they don't. so i wanted to point out the latest female skin with cleavage which is in this case vayne, and wonder if they reduce it too - and if not, why it's okay for Vayne or MF to have a massive cleavage but not for Camille. thats all. imo pretty understandable and nothing special, but special enough to point it out.

>the issue is, that Riot listen to some loud voices on "reddit" or whatsoever and remove EXISTING things. 

If you think that it's what happened with the Camille chroma you talk about you are wrong, I use more Reddit that Boards and everyone there was saying that it was the best chroma, once it was changed we even had a thread asking for it to be reverted on the front page.


>why it's okay for Vayne or MF to have a massive cleavage but not for Camille. thats all. imo pretty understandable and nothing special, but special enough to point it out.

Because MF and Vayne have different designs a than Camille, MF is designed to be extremly hot and she's the champ with bigger breasts in the game along with Sona, that's she has a lot of skins with huge cleavage. 

Vayne was designed back in the the days when every female champ had the same perfect hourglass body and even though she's not that exaggerated as MF she has always been like that.

But Camille design is a old lady half ciborg and being hot has never been part of her design.

Yes all 3 are female champs, but not all have the same design as it happened years ago, I'm not against fanservice or having hot womans in videogame, hell I *main* MF for *reasons*. But I like that not all female champs are full fanservice anymore.

But Vayne is a damn serious and badass huntress and no MF. oO Imo it  doesn’t make sense to give her that massive cleavage -  on the other hand... she has a pig in her crossbow...

ppl who argue that Camille doesn’t deserve cleavage cause it doesn’t fit her Charakter or cause she is old... I just have to laugh out loud. Lisandra is old zoo yet she has a big cleavage in one of her skins. Why does an old lady not have the opportunity to wear an outfit with massiv cleavage? What’s wrong with that? (Beside she doesn’t look like that) 
And it’s just her Chroma Not her base.

I really question the sanity of some ppl.

But thanks for your comment was polite and thoughtful. Happens not too often.

>If Arcade MF has a massive cleavage why does Waterloo MF not have cleavage ?

See? It's just a stupid question.

My gosh. Another comment about cleavage of women and yet theres a shirtless guy who looks like hes into..... kinky.... activities. Id be tempted to be putting on that one song that has "sticks and stones may break my bones, but chains and whips excite me" on every time i play him.

People need to give it a break in every direction.
He clearly stated that the cleavage itself wasn't the issue, it was the fact that vayne got to show off skin but camille didn't.
The Camille change was in direct response to player feedback, saying showing so much skin felt out of character.  I can find the PBE thread if you want it.

thanks Steel Lady. i didn't complain about they show too much skin. it's the other way around. its a fictional game with digital champions. and yet Riot removes here and there skin just cause of some loud crying dudes on... reddit or whatever i guess. instead of let the fantasy be. and i dont have a problem with some shirtless guy. its a game 

vayne was just some example

Edit: and i don't want to disappoint you but you don't need to call me your gosh, Silly Neeko. i am an ordinary human being.

Fictional titty is not an issue

I think you need more problems if you think it is
you didn't get the point did you. if you need help in understanding the point of some persons' thoughts,  i give you a tip for free: ASK them. - or don't comment.

I'm not trying to understand. I'm definitively telling you that fictional titties aren't important in the grand scheme of things. 

(Yeah I get your point was Camille gets titty when Vayne doesn't, it still really doesn't matter though)

can you link me the splash art?
I can't find it on google

Camille before: 

https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pe5wGn-kgsQ/W-NF7OI1qgI/AAAAAAABKvw/wigrci3Ba9412Tzf1-0ZKBx7V9gHBJ46QCLcBGAs/s1600/164003.png

Camille after: 

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4oXQI8NZ2SM/W-s3FxaW2mI/AAAAAAABK-E/xNEFyn64SlcHFkj-eC8PcyMK7dIywgU7gCLcBGAs/s1600/164003.png

Vayne's new skin:

https://cdn.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/84w-N2Tn2y7Iivq7Hbb1gVa78-c=/0x0:1093x441/920x0/filters:focal(0x0:1093x441):format(webp):no_upscale()/cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/13679293/vayne_versus_prestige_vayne.png

That's still having cleavage, the second picture of Camille has a cleavage even though it's smaller than in the first one.

What does have to do with Vayne skin ?

if you dont understand the connection my friend i can't really help you. cause it should be obvious. but i try to help you a bit:

camille and vayne are both girls. both show cleavage. and vayne is just the latest example of a still not reduced cleavage.
How do you know they won't remove Vayne's cleavage?
Because it makes sense for her character.

Camille can't have a cleavage but she can have massive thighs for some reason.

Ok.
Camille still have a cleavage in the reduced cleavage chroma, it's just not that big.
